definition: (literary) to end/to stop/one of the stanzas (usually two) of a ci poem 詞|词[ci2]/classifier for songs or ci poems

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
tenth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/tenth in order/letter "J" or Roman "X" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 15°/deca
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]
third and fourth lines (in an eight-line poem) which form a couplet
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
